pullRequest.title: CB-6362: Update FreeIPA IP addresses during repair
pullRequest.bodyText:
During a FreeIPA repair, the FreeIPA management service now calls the
environment service to update the IP addresses for the FreeIPA
servers.
This was tested on a local cloudbreak deployment.
See detailed description in the commit message.

nodes.bodyText:
shouldn't we log the exception here? and if it's a webapplicationexception we might need to use WebApplicationExceptionMessageExtractor to get the real message.
same applies to upscale
